name: test_e2e_with_logs[068_SQLI_ERROR_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_007` |
| **Name** | Information schema table access |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT * FROM information_schema.tables LIMIT 1) --`

- **Expected Detection**: Yes
